Create a lunchbox that doubles as a portable meditation cushion: This lunchbox can be designed with a comfortable seat and a cushioning material to make it comfortable to sit on while eating lunch. It can also have a meditation timer or guided meditation app to help you meditate and relax during your lunch break.

A lunchbox that tracks your water intake: This lunchbox can have a built-in water tracker or a separate app that syncs with your phone to track your water intake. You can set a daily water intake goal and the lunchbox can remind you to drink water throughout the day.

A lunchbox with a built-inlock: This lunchbox can have a built-in padlock to keep your lunch safe from theft or misplacement. It can also have a GPS tracker to help you locate your lunchbox if it gets lost.
